articles.title: Whatsapp update download will stop app on some iPhones and android - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: There will also be changes to the messaging app on most iPhones and Androids.
articles.content:
WhatsApp will end support on some old Android and iOS smartphones in 2021 according to reports.
The Facebook-owned messaging app will stop working on phones that are not running on at least iOS 9 or… [+2208 chars]
